name: Fast West [LD34]
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34: Two Button Controls, Growing.

+ 1 - 2 Players

+ Can be played using only keyboard

Controls:

A, D for Player 1.

Left, Right arrows for Player 2.

One button cocks the hammer and another fires from the weapon, but their roles are random, so be careful.

A, D, S, F for menu, as prompted on screen.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello World! That's my first Ludum Dare and for it I just made a
mini-game about Wild West duels. I made two button controlled gameplay
for the Ludum Dare theme. Also my friend (listed in credits) made a
music for the game (that's why I'm starting in the Jam, not the Compo
:P).

I was making it for about 12 hours. It's not a piece of art, but I hope you enjoy it!

Tools used:

+ GameMaker Studio

+ ChipTone
